alert.note: Alert for Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Tipton and northeastern Shelby Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dixonville, or near Millington, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millington, Munford, Brighton, Dixonville, Tipton, Atoka, Gilt Edge, Barretville, Egypt, Quito, Wilkinsville, Redwood, Rosemark, Drummonds, Idaville, Crosstown, Beaver, Kerrville, Akins Corner and Randolph. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and west Tennessee.
